pages.text: An attuned stone may be charged by a witch to be later used in place of altar power while performing a rite. Only certain rites allow for the use of attuned stone, as indicated.

$(l)Rite of Charging$()$(br2)$(o)Store power in an attuned stone for later use$()$(br2) - Attuned Stone$(br) - Glowstone Dust$(br) - Restone$(br) - Wood Ash$(br) - Quicklime$(br2)Altar power: 2000$(br2)Small ritual circle$(br)Medium ritual circle
